name: Hanoi Luxury Apartment By Favstay
address: 4 Trieu Viet Vuong, Hai Ba Trung District, Hanoi, Vietnam
hotelDesc:
Featuring air conditioning, Hanoi Luxury Apartment By Favstay is located in Hanoi, 700 metres from Trang Tien Plaza. The accommodation features a spa bath. Ba Dinh Square is 800 metres from the property. Free WiFi is offered .

All units feature a seating and dining area. All units have a kitchenette equipped with a microwave and fridge. Towels are provided.

Quan Su Temple is 900 metres from Hanoi Luxury Apartment By Favstay, while Hanoi Opera House is 1 km away. The nearest airport is Noi Bai International Airport, 22 km from the property.
